column4: lol - Ubuntu is amazing. IRC #ubuntu, Streamtuner '80s channel +XMMS,  Mel Gibson "The Year of  Living Dangerously" and just for the heck of it Quake2 started in a window. - 1.5g machine 360megs ram.
you have low expections from computers eh? :-)
